titles.title: Providing for the use of the catafalque situated in the crypt beneath the rotunda of the Capitol in connection with memorial services to be conducted in the Supreme Court Building for the late honorable Harry A. Blackmun, former Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mr. Thomas asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 3/9/1999--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Architect of the Capitol to transfer the catafalque in the crypt beneath the Capitol rotunda to the Chief Justice of the United States for use in the Supreme Court building for services for the late honorable Harry A. Blackmun, former Associate Justice of the Supreme Court.
